content.html: whenever some VC tweets about some use case for crypto: - you could do the same thing without crypto - it would be less complicated - the crypto version bottoms out on the same problem anyway - it probably doesn't work
content.value:
whenever some VC tweets about some use case for crypto:
- you could do the same thing without crypto
- it would be less complicated
- the crypto version bottoms out on the same problem anyway
- it probably doesn't work
